Posts.Content: Hi, I started Letrozole 2-3 months ago following pelvic radiotherapy. I'm 44 and had hip ache before I started the Letrozole which seems worse now.  I simply take cod liver oil capsules and after as little as a week I can honestly say I noticed a difference.  I also do a bit of Pilates if I remember and find this helps. Report
Posts.Title: Side effects of Letrozole
